text: Hugh Grant net worth : Hugh Grant is a British actor and producer who has a net worth of $ 80 million. Hugh Grant was born in London on September 9, 1960. However, Grant soon performed in a touring production of ` ` Twelfth Night,'' and started participating in the Oxford University Dramatic Society.
